languages.text: {n}Хротко бесстрастно наблюдает, как его люди, орудуя дубинками и ногами, допрашивают серфов. Завидев вас, он коротко кивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".
{n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хротко бесстрастно наблюдает, как его люди, орудуя дубинками и ногами, допрашивают серфов. Завидев вас, он коротко кивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}Hrotko observe la scène avec indifférence alors que ses hommes interrogent les serfs à grands coups de pied et de matraque. Il salue votre arrivée d'un bref hochement de tête.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko observe la scène avec indifférence alors que ses hommes interrogent les serfs à grands coups de pied et de matraque. Il salue votre arrivée d'un bref hochement de tête.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Hrotko mira con indiferencia cómo su gente usa porras y patadas para interrogar a los plebeyos. Al verte, asiente brevemente.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko mira con indiferencia cómo su gente usa porras y patadas para interrogar a los plebeyos. Al verte, asiente brevemente.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡一脸冷漠地看着他的手下审讯船员，看着他们用警棍殴打船员，用脚踹他们。注意到你之后，他简短地朝你点点头。{/n}“大人，您来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡一脸冷漠地看着他的手下审讯船员，看着他们用警棍殴打船员，用脚踹他们。注意到你之后，他简短地朝你点点头。{/n}“大人，您来了。”

languages.text: {n}警棒と脚を使って農奴たちを尋問する部下たちを、フロトコは無関心に眺めている。あなたに気づくと、彼はそっけなくうなずいた。{/n} 「閣下、閣下」
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}警棒と脚を使って農奴たちを尋問する部下たちを、フロトコは無関心に眺めている。あなたに気づくと、彼はそっけなくうなずいた。{/n} 「閣下、閣下」

languages.text: {n}Hrotko sieht desinteressiert zu, wie seine Leute die Sklaven mit Hilfe ihrer Schlagstöcke und Beine verhören. Als er dich bemerkt, nickt er knapp.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko sieht desinteressiert zu, wie seine Leute die Sklaven mit Hilfe ihrer Schlagstöcke und Beine verhören. Als er dich bemerkt, nickt er knapp.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Hrotko, emrindekiler copları ve tekmeleriyle köleleri sorguya çekerken kayıtsız bir şekilde bakıyor. Seni fark etmesinin ardından başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on with indifference as his people use their batons and legs to interrogate the serfs. Upon noticing you, he nods curtly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
